message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $13500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $12500. I appreciate your interest in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13750. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a great deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
